label: Balanced Index
description: Screens out fossil fuel companies but no impact targets.

label: Balanced Impact
description: Screens out fossil fuel companies. Targets investment in social impact and renewable energy projects.

highlightInvestments.label: Vision Fund International
highlightInvestments.definition: Micro-finance products that promote financial inclusion in rural areas, particularly for people living in poverty

highlightInvestments.label: IIG Solar Asset Fund
highlightInvestments.definition: An unlisted portfolio of up to $180m in Australian solar infrastructure

label: Renewables Plus Growth
description: Screens out fossil fuel companies. Targets 20% allocation to climate change solutions.

highlightInvestments.label: Juice Capital Energy
highlightInvestments.definition: Finances and develops solar energy projects

highlightInvestments.label: Infradebt Ethical Fund
highlightInvestments.definition: Provides loans to renewable energy and social infrastructure projects in Australia

highlightInvestments.label: Green Squares Energy
highlightInvestments.definition: Organises leases, loans, and rentals of solar energy
